headline: Avery Dennison (AVY) Beats Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Avery Dennison (AVY) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 0.42% and 0.57%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Avery Dennison: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.37 per share. The maker of office products posted revenue of $2.19 billion in the period, which fell short of Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.2 billion.

raw.headline: Avery Dennison: Q4 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Avery Dennison (NYSE:AVY) Posts Q4 Sales In Line With Estimates
summary: Adhesive manufacturing company Avery Dennison (NYSE:AVY) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024, with sales up 3.6% year on year to $2.19 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.38 per share was 1.3% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
